name: server
description: 此文文件是此项目的后端api部分

scripts.start: npm run start:build && npm run start:server
scripts.start:build: npm run clear:server && npm run clear:client && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run clear:server && webpack --config ./config/webpack.server.config.js --progress
scripts.build:server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run clear:server && webpack --config ./config/webpack.server.config.js --watch
scripts.server: npm run clear:server && npm run build:server && npm run start:server
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:client
